app_descript:
HiddenMe: Learn More About Yourself

Brief: HiddenMe is a captivating app designed to transform your appearance in fascinating ways using various filters. Featuring an age filter, baby filter, gender swap capability, and an ethnicity analyzer, HiddenMe encourages users to indulge in a fun exploration of different looks and share these altered images with friends on social media platforms like Snapchat, Instagram, Facebook, and WhatsApp.
